interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: NAILGIL Poly Nail Gel (Temperature) Review Date: 2021/01/13 Store: NAIL GIL Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NAIL GIL', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.45 x 4.72 x 1.18 inches'} Review Text: I have seen a ton of social media posts about these poly gel kits and figured I would give it a try. I am not a professional at all and can barely paint my own nails. I watched a couple of YouTube videos before giving this a try and I didn't do terrible! Here are some pointers for those of you that are trying this out for the first time.
1) you need to have a uv/led curing light. You start with the clear base and cure it before applying the gel. Apply the gel and cure, then apply the top coat and cure.
2) thick but not too thick!- If you make it too thin, the tips will just bend and break off. You need to make sure that you are putting it on about the consistency of the plastic nail that you use to apply the gel.
3) Don't forget to fix the bottom of the nail tip before you cure. If you don't do this you will have a giant glob of hardened get that you will need to file down.
4) If you don't want an ombre effect, you will need to make sure that the thickness is consistent from the top to the bottom of the nail.
5) Have a few disposable nail files. The giant one that comes with the kit isn't my favorite because it is quite bulky. I used a few coarse nail files to really get the shape that I wanted.

The kit itself is nicely put together, I just wish there were directions with it. You will need to have a lamp, nail file, cuticle cutter, and nail trimmers to accomplish your finished nails which is why I gave 4 stars instead of 5. Review Title: first time Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits {'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'} Well atleast you get the light! If you want color polish, you will have to go buy some. I was wondering where it was because it shows it on the box. I decided to read other reviews and see if I was the only one. Turns out it just isn't in the box. I've had other kits in the past and was hoping this one would be better but it was the worst. The top/base coat was very runny which made it very hard to paint my nails properly. Some items not included 35.4 Inch Extra Long Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, 2021 Updated Lengthen Back Scrubber Brush for Men and Women, Exfoliating Back Washer with Wall Hooks, Easy Clean, Comfortable Massage (Green 27.5in) MAORULU {'Package Dimensions': '8.75 x 5.5 x 2.6 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '757173533773', 'Manufacturer': 'MAORULU'} My favorite part of this is the sticky hooks that come with it. I tried putting body wash on it but it's a bit tricky to do. The one side with the bristles feels great on your back the opposite side isn't anything special. Very easy to clean and nice that you can hang it anywhere. The extras make it worth it NAILGIL Poly Nail Gel (Temperature) NAIL GIL {'Brand': 'NAIL GIL', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.45 x 4.72 x 1.18 inches'} I have seen a ton of social media posts about these poly gel kits and figured I would give it a try. I am not a professional at all and can barely paint my own nails. I watched a couple of YouTube videos before giving this a try and I didn't do terrible! Here are some pointers for those of you that are trying this out for the first time.
1) you need to have a uv/led curing light. You start with the clear base and cure it before applying the gel. Apply the gel and cure, then apply the top coat and cure.
2) thick but not too thick!- If you make it too thin, the tips will just bend and break off. You need to make sure that you are putting it on about the consistency of the plastic nail that you use to apply the gel.

4) If you don't want an ombre effect, you will need to make sure that the thickness is consistent from the top to the bottom of the nail.
5) Have a few disposable nail files. The giant one that comes with the kit isn't my favorite because it is quite bulky. I used a few coarse nail files to really get the shape that I wanted.

The kit itself is nicely put together, I just wish there were directions with it. You will need to have a lamp, nail file, cuticle cutter, and nail trimmers to accomplish your finished nails which is why I gave 4 stars instead of 5. first time
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preference for DIY Nail Care:** The user has a strong interest in at-home manicures and nail care products, particularly experiences with new techniques and products.
- **Interest in Kits:** They seek starter kits, showing a preference for bundled products that provide essential tools and materials for nail care.
- **Quality Expectations:** The user has high standards for product quality and completeness, expressing disappointment when essential items are missing or when products underperform.
- **Review Behavior:** They conduct thorough research and consider user reviews before making purchasing decisions, indicating a systematic approach to evaluating products.
- **Skepticism Towards Marketing:** The user is critical of misleading packaging and incomplete product contents, emphasizing the importance of brands fulfilling their advertised promises.
- **Experience with Alternatives:** Their past experiences with various kits provide them with a comparative perspective and familiarity in the category.
- **Specific Issues Noted:** They value consistency in product texture and performance, reflecting a desire for user-friendly application and effective results.
- **Expanded Interests:** The user has developed an interest in bath and body products that enhance self-care routines, prioritizing practicality, efficiency in application, and the overall quality of these items. They appreciate additional features that promote organization and usability.

Overall, the user places great importance on transparency, quality, and comprehensive product offerings across both nail and body care purchases.
